resources.string: Let us create you an account real quick.It wont take long!
Provide your username and password to login back to your account
By providing your metatrader credentials,your account will be deployed securely on the cloud.
Provide the email that you used to sign up with,a link to reset your password will be sent to you via email
Verifying your email,Upon verification we will be using your email to send you updates. Please enter the 6 digit code sent to your email
You can always change who you are later
You can be able to add other trading platform(s) later

TradeShare empowers traders to establish trustworthy connections with the global community by transparently showcasing their trading portfolios.To achieve this, we need your help in making some of your trading data public. Follow the instructions below to deploy your trading accounts in the ctrader trading platform.

Establish connections with successful traders by analyzing their trading portfolios. Identify profitable strategies and engage with experienced traders to foster a collaborative and mutually beneficial trading community.
1.Login to your ctrader account if you are currently not logged in

2.If you have no applications listed,please create one by clicking Add New App and give it a few hours for it to be verified by the ctrader team and then come back to this screen,repeat the steps but skip step 2.
3.To be at this step,i assume you already have an application listed,click view on the one you want to deploy,copy the Client ID and the Secret
4.Proceed by clicking playground,then GetToken,Allow access to trading accounts by checking them then click Allow Access.
5.Now copy the Access Token and the Refresh Token and you are Done.

Showcase your trading prowess by listing your accounts on leading trading platforms, complete with a comprehensive portfolio. This not only attracts potential investors but also opens the door to connect with like-minded individuals, fostering a network for shared insights and opportunities in the world of trading
I agree to Tradeshare Terms & Conditions
